title: Significance of the Voting Rights Act

content.prompt: The passing of the Voting Rights Act of 1965 is a significant political event because it

choices.label: scaled back the provisions of the Fifteenth Amendment
was used to emancipate southern African Americans
was declared unconstitutional by the United States Supreme Court in Shaw v. Reno
was instrumental in increasing the number of African American and other minority voters

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
